summary: REQ-31 appears implemented: the AppLayout footer now only renders “Created by Angelica Arboleda”, with no visible “© {year} HeartSync. Built with … using caffeine.ai” text, heart icon, or caffeine.ai link. Two additional metadata/state files were modified that were not requested by the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/modified frontend file summary metadata content not requested by the BuildRequest.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to remove a specific footer attribution line; it did not request regenerating or editing summary metadata files.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/modified project state metadata not requested by the BuildRequest.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not request any changes to project state tracking/metadata—only a UI footer text removal.
